Evaluate the following expression and choose the resulting value.

"1" + 1

Choose the value and type.

(4 > 3) + "blue"

Select initializers for A, B, and C to produce the output 1, 2, 3.


int A = __A;  // Select correct variable initializer
int B = __B;
int C = __C;

for (int i = A; i < B; i = i + C) {
   System.out.println(i);
}

Enter initializers for A, B, and C to produce the output: 1, 2, 3.


int A = __A;  // Init variables
int B = __B;
int C = __C;

for (int i = A; i < B; i = i + C) {
  System.out.println(i);
}

Drag the lines of code on the left to the box on the right and rearrange so the resulting code snippet produces the output: 1 2 3 Done, in that order.

int i = 0;
while (i < 3) {
    System.out.println(i);
    i = i + 1;
}
System.out.printline("Done");

Drag the boxes on the left to the matching boxes on the right
